title: Pavlov VR
notes: HTC. Degraded performance and missing buttons in multiplayer menu, but otherwise playable

Buttons are unclickable/invisible - but this can be fixed by changing Graphics settings (up or down - doesn't seem to matter). Performance is generally good, but all sound (shots, voices, ambient sound) is at max volume, not matter the source of the sound and the distance to it.
title: Pavlov VR

gpu: X.Org Radeon RX 580 Series (POLARIS10, DRM 3.26.0, 4.18.8-041808-generic, LLVM 7.0.0)
notes: It kind of just works, but you'll have to get through the beginning to make it really playable. Sometimes like when loading a new weapon it doesn't show frames for like a second but that stops after like 2-3 minutes. And sounds are maybe not attenuating, but that could just be my impression bc gunshots are generally loud
title: Pavlov VR
